cards.title: Pebbles OS Kernel
cards.description: Course project of 15-410, developed with Ishan Bhargava

cards.title: Memory Allocator
cards.description:
Course assignment for 15-213's mallocLab

 Created a struct-based segregated free list memory allocator, designing structs in order to best minimize internal fragmentation, accounting for tiny blocks (16 bytes) in constructing doubly-linked free lists, developing a fit algorithm, and implementing free block coalescing.
